website_summaries.verdict: All the strengths of the Britax brand at a lower price.
pros: Adjustment system for straps does not require re-threading
Rated for children from 5 to 65 pounds
cons: The instructions can be difficult to understand on this model

customer_reviews.title: Secure & Safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 19 months baby girl. Is a perfect and secure car seat for her. She love it. I have two more Britax but is my first time with an Allergiance. For my husband and me the most important thing is to be secure and safe when we are transporting our children. The installation is easy and it was perfect in my honda odyssey
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: THE RANGE ROVER OF CAR SEATS.........
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the LAND ROVER of Car Seats for babies and toddlers. It is well-designed and smart looking. Easy in and out for infants and children. Easy to take apart and clean . My daughter did her due diligence in researching the safest car seats and chose this brand. This car seat was bought for a grandparents vehicle. We ordered a couple more of this one for my grandchildren’s sitter and aunt’s vehicle too. If you want the safest and best designed car seat for your babies and toddlers buy BRITAX. You can find any extra accessories for this brand too.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen O’Dell

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! I bought this seat last year and it still looks brand new. It's the best car seat I've ever owned, the easiest to install and uninstall and I feel confident that its correct and my son is safe! And soooooooo easy to keep clean!!! I just went back to work so I ordered a 2nd one for my husbands car. My son loves the seat too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: good car seat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 older britax car seats that were very good, easy to install. They were the same a this one but did not have the sliding back for height adjustment. I find this chair very similar but I don't like the sliding back. Its harder than the old seats to adjust the child harness.
customer_reviews.author: naperpeds

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to deal with
customer_reviews.text: The straps on this are extremely awkward and it’s not at all user friendly on the install. It does have plenty of cushion but it’s not great on the strap comfort or usability.
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy&B

customer_reviews.title: Britax is always the best
customer_reviews.text: Will only buy this brand for safety reasons. Britax is always an "A" from baby bargains.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing not really user friendly tho but my big baby boy loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Nakira Griner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this carseat.
customer_reviews.text: The button to loosen the straps is very hard to access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! Actually have bought two of them!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if the car seat is good or not but i do know that i have ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the car seat is good or not but i do know that i have spent 30 minutes trying to understand the installation instructions and had no luck with it because it is written in a confusing way, and the supporting pictures are not comprehensive enough. I will spend another 30 min "youtubing" and if unsuccesful i will be returning the product. You need to be more considerate to the fact that some people doing this for the first time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Great Features, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: My ten month old son is using this seat in our minivan and we love it. It was incredibly easy to install compared to Graco or even Diono cArseats we have. I love the Velcro strap holders for the harnessing. My husband enjoys what he calls the peep protector, the padding around the groin buckle. The seat is attractive and very sturdy and safe feeling. It doesn’t take up a huge amount of room either. Thus far after 6 weeks of use I have no complaints and would definitely consider getting another Britax in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hope

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade from the Britax B-Safe
customer_reviews.text: For this being “economy” line of car seats, I am super impressed. This seat fits really well in my GMC Terrain, and I love that it has all the safety features Britax is known for: the steel frame, the multi-position recline, etc. The fabric feels softer and more padded than our britax infant seat so our little guy LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morphew

customer_reviews.title: easy install, secure
customer_reviews.text: The car seat was really easy to install and easy to secure. There was no shifting or wobbling. It feels really sturdy and well made. The cushions and materials feel soft and comfy. My daughter seems comfortable in it on long car rides. It's easy to clean as well, which is a big plus. The harness is easy to work with. This car seat can handle up to 65lbs so it will definitely grow with my daughter. A small drawback is the lack of cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: OnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice snug seat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter, it's a nice snug seat, when she sits in it it's tight but she really likes it. It is angled back a bit so more reclined even when it's adjusted properly but makes car naps easy and comfy. Overall very easy to pop in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice seat. We have been happy with it and don't see a reason to spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snavely

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This seat has nice colors, is easy to install and just by touching it I know it feels comfortable. My 5 year old nephew has one and now so does my 2 year old neice.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

product_meta.title: Britax Allegiance Convertible Car Seat, Static
product_meta.description: The Allegiance Convertible Car Seat is safe and comfortable for your growing child while you're on the go. Car seat installation is a breeze with push button LATCH connectors and built-in lock-offs. Designed with Britax safety technologies, the Allegiance car seat features the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system which includes side impact protection, a steel frame, impact absorbing base, and forward movement reducing v-shaped tether. The Allegiance Convertible Car Seat is made with a strong layer of side energy absorption; a foam-lined shell will shield your child from side impacts in the event of a collision. Plus, foam padding and three recline positions keep your b aby comfy and cozy along the way, while the 10-position easy-adjust harness and headrest allows you to never have to rethread again. The Allegiance car seat can be used rear-facing 5-40 pounds and forward-facing 20-65 pounds, child standing height 49” or less. Car seat dimensions 18.5" W x 26" H x 21" D. 10-position harness slot heights 8.5” to 17.5”. FAA approved.
feature_bullets: Easy installation: Push button LATCH connectors and built in lock-offs make car seat installation a breeze
No rethreading, ever: Quick-adjust 10-position harness (8.5 to 17.5 inches) with headrest grows along with your child
Easy clean-up: Remove the car seat cover without removing the harness
Designed for safety: Side impact protection, steel frame, impact absorbing base, and forward movement reducing v-shaped tether
Fits: Rear-facing 5-40 pounds and forward-facing 20-65 pounds; Dimensions: 26” H x 18.5” W x 21” D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
